name: Bitcoin Hashrate and Price Plotter
description: Fetches historical Bitcoin hashrate and price data from Blockchain.info API, creates a plot with dual y-axes showing hashrate in TH/s and price in USD, saves the plot to a file in the home directory, and outputs the plot path along with current hashrate and price values.
author: @@official.shinkai

period.description: The time period for data: 'All Time', 'Last Month', 'Last 6 Months', 'Last Year', 'Last 5 Years', 'Last 10 Years'. Defaults to 'All Time'.

plot_path.description: File path to the saved plot PNG
